author: Brian Costa
title: Shaun White Takes Gold in Men’s Halfpipe
text:
BONGPYEONG, South Korea—As he stood atop the Olympic halfpipe on Wednesday morning, Shaun White felt an overwhelming sense of déjà vu. He had been in a comparable position four years ago: down to his last run in the men’s snowboard halfpipe final, needing to do something spectacular to claim the gold medal.
The similarities ended there. In Sochi, White stumbled to a shocking fourth-place finish. Here, all he did was pull off one of the greatest Olympic halfpipe runs ever. The high-flying masterpiece earned White, a 31-year-old...
